appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction img-head\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\u003d\u003d\"\r\n      alt\u003d\"App Icon\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eCampaign Analytics\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cp\u003e\r\n      This app enables marketing and sales teams to assess the effectiveness of promotional campaigns. It combines descriptive and predictive analytics to uncover customer segments, predict coupon usage, and understand buying behavior and sentimentâ€”helping optimize campaign targeting and drive sales growth.\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eInput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cp\u003e\r\n      The app uses the following datasets:\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Campaign Data\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Household Demographics\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Coupons\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Products\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Sales Transactions\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Product Reviews\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOutput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n     \u003cp\u003e\r\n      The app provides:\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e  Customer segments\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Coupon redemption predictions\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Churn risk scores\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Campaign responsiveness metrics\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Sentiment analysis of product reviews\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Visual sales \u0026 behavior trends\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eBenefits\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Target the Right Customers: Identify exactly which customer segments respond to specific campaign types based on actual purchase data.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Measure True Campaign ROI: See precisely which promotions drive sales versus those that simply reward existing buying behavior.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Predict Coupon Performance: Forecast redemption rates before launch to set proper discount levels and budget requirements.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Spot At-Risk Customers: Identify customers showing early signs of switching brands before they\u0027re lost completely.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Turn Feedback into Action: Transform product reviews into specific improvement priorities that boost repeat purchases.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
